com.gwt.ss.client.loginable
Interface LoginableService<T extends LoginableAsync>

public interface LoginableService<T extends LoginableAsync>

A wrapper(proxy) for asynchronous remoteService descended from LoginableAsync.
繼承自LoginableAsync的非同步remoteService 的代理物件。

Author:
Kent Yeh
